title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a mango tree in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about picking a mango from a tree. Interpretation of seeing a mango picked from a tree in a dream, and it was one of the auspicious visions for the trip, which has the meaning of losing anxiety. Also, seeing a fruitless mango tree in a dream indicates that the dreamer must be patient and strive to achieve his goals. Picking mangoes in a dream It is an omen of goodness and happiness and indicates the fulfillment of desires and reaching impossible things. Also, seeing a mango in a dream indicates happy events that will enter the life of the dreamer and is a sign of hearing good news. Cutting mango trees in a dream is an unpleasant dream that has meanings that do not indicate goodness and symbolize To death. Interpretation of seeing a mango tree in a dream for a single woman. Climbing mango trees in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates that she will try to achieve her dreams and desires. Seeing mangoes being picked from a tree in a dream means great livelihood, blessings, and a close marriage. Interpretation of seeing mangoes eaten in a dream for an unmarried woman. A married woman is evidence that she will overcome her problems and triumph over her enemies. Interpretation of a dream about picking mangoes from a tree for a married woman. Seeing planting a mango tree in a dream for a married woman is one of the dreams that has nutritional significance with pregnancy and succession. Picking mangoes in a dream for a married woman indicates that she has gone through difficult stages and achieved Many desires and goals. Also, seeing a mango in a dream means recovering from an illness and putting an end to the problems one suffers from. Buying a mango in a dream is a sign of great wealth, abundant money, and the emergence of many happy changes. A mango in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a mango in a dream is one of the Visions that indicate that God will provide a pregnant woman with the child she wants, male or female. Eating a mango greedily in a dream for a pregnant woman is a sign of goodness, good nutrition, and blessing in her life and the life of the newborn. Also, seeing a mango in a dream for a pregnant woman is good news. Good, happiness, and hearing good news. Interpretation of a dream about a ripe mango. Interpretation of seeing a fresh mango in a dream is a sign of great wealth and benefit that the dreamer will gain. Seeing yourself buying mangoes in a dream means days full of happiness and enjoyable events that the dreamer will experience. Eating a ripe mango in a dream is evidence of... The end of sorrows, freedom from anxiety, and overcoming problems. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about finding a wallet and seeing a dream about finding a wallet in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of finding a wallet for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman. Ibn Sirin loses the wallet in a dream. Buying a wallet by stealing the black wallet. Interpretation of a dream about finding a wallet according to Ibn Sirin. This vision is interpreted in two ways. If the wallet is full of money, this indicates that you will live a comfortable life and that you will not suffer, and not all material things. Failures that will occur in your professional life, and a person who finds a wallet with no money in it will ruin his work and expose himself to some worries. Sometimes this vision is interpreted as an invalid share and profit that gives you a benefit. Interpretation of finding a wallet in a dream: The visionary will achieve great profit and his business will be very good and thus he will find an end to all his problems. At the same time, he will live beautiful days in the family and spend beautiful days, and goodness and blessing will increase within the home. If one dreams that he finds a wallet in a dream, this means that he will receive good food. Explanation of finding the wallet and returning it to its owner. If you dream that you found a wallet and returned it to its owner, the dream indicates that you It will maintain trust and give confidence to its people, and this is a good trait. Interpretation of a wallet in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of supplication in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of supplication in a dream. Interpretation scholars have interpreted the vision of begging in a dream and that it has many meanings and connotations, including good and evil. In this article, we will learn about the interpretation of begging in a dream as narrated by scholars. You may also be interested in the following: Bathing in a dream. Interpretation of supplication in a dream. Interpretation of supplication in a dream according to scholars. The interpretation is that an unmarried woman who sees the supplication in her dreams has many meanings depending on her location: If she sees that she is praying after the prayer, this indicates her condition and good morals, and that she will be freed from her problems. And if she finds while she is sleeping that she is praying in the rain, this symbolizes Almighty God’s response to her prayer. And her good news of good news and success in her life. Seeing her pleading with God while screaming and crying means that her wish will come true soon. Crying in a dream is almost a symbol of the dreamer’s dream. And if she performs the dawn prayer at its time, and sees at that time that she is praying for a righteous husband, then this is good news that God Almighty responded to her, and repeating this vision to her is evidence that you will do it soon. Get involved. You may be interested: Pregnancy in a dreamPrayer in a dream for a married womanWhen she sees that she is praying to God and this woman is continuing her prayers, this is a good sign that will come to her and her husband. But if she sees that she is praying to God and the sky is raining, because of this her husband will be promoted in his job and he will improve Her life situation. But seeing a woman in her dreams praying for her children is a sign that she will achieve and obtain what she desires from her prayers. But if she finds herself praying for good offspring while she is childless, this is an indication of her desire to have children, and if it rains during that time, this is a good vision. For her good news on the day that approaches her pregnancy. In general, praying in a dream for a wife is good news of abundant livelihood and good news for her and her family and their safety from all harm. You may also be interested in: Penguin in a dream A request in a dream for a pregnant woman. A dream of supplication in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that her prayers will be answered and she will give birth as well. She wants. While if she finds in her dream that the sky is praying and it is raining, this symbolizes her easy birth. It also indicates the success of her social life. Prayer in a dream for a divorced woman When a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is praying to God, this is evidence that she is almost at ease and freed from her problems. It may indicate Also, that God has compensated her and that her wedding date is approaching. While if she finds herself praying for her ex-husband, this is a symbol of his return to her again. Praying in a dream for a man. Seeing a man praying in a dream indicates a high status in his work. While it also indicates his good halal food. If a person falls short of God’s right and sees in his dream that he is begging, then this indicates repentance. While watching an unmarried person praying in a dream, this is good news about the earliest date of his imminent marriage. Washing the deadPrayer in the darkIf the fortuneteller is found praying to God Almighty in the dark, this is a sign of... That God will answer his prayer that he was praying for. It also indicates that God will protect me from the calamities that threaten him and fear him in his life. Perhaps it symbolizes God’s answer to him and the fulfillment of his desire.

title: Interpretation of seeing drinking water in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about drinking water by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin narrates that the vision of drinking water in a dream indicates many things, some of which are good and some of which are bad. Also, drinking water in a dream is one of the visions that indicate the goodness of relatives and abundant food in the dreamer’s life. Also, seeing him drinking water shows the dreamer that Happiness and joys will come, and God knows best. Drinking water in one’s dream is considered evidence that one will enjoy feeding good offspring during his life. Seeing water in a sick person’s dream indicates a speedy recovery from his illness and enjoyment of good health. Seeing water that someone takes in a dream is a result of the dreamer’s need for that person. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing ships drinking in a dream. Interpretation of drinking water in a dream for a single woman. Drinking fresh water in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that she has entered into a happy life and that the date of her marriage is approaching. The interpretation of drinking cloudy water in a dream is one of the visions that indicate failure. The emotional relationship that you are experiencing. An unmarried man drinking water from a flowing river indicates the beginning of a new life and the fulfillment of his desires. And salty water and drinking it in a single person’s dream, in its interpretation, indicates his engagement and a successful relationship that he will go through. See also: Interpretation of drinking wine in a dream. Interpretation of seeing water Drinking in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of drinking water in a dream for a married woman indicates her good obedience to her husband. But if a woman gives water to someone, her interpretation indicates that she lies a lot. And when she gives water to her husband in a dream, this indicates her husband’s satisfaction with her. And seeing her husband drinking water In a dream with some people, it may mean that her husband is cheating on her. See also: Interpretation of a dream about eating poison in a dream. Interpretation of seeing drinking water in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing water and drinking it in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she will enjoy an easy birth and that her fetus will be healthy. If she drinks Zamzam water in In a dream, this indicates blessing and the appearance of happiness and joy. The interpretation of drinking cloudy water in a dream for a pregnant woman also shows visions that indicate problems and obstacles in her next life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing licorice in a dream. Interpretation of seeing drinking water in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a divorced woman drinking water in a dream. The dream means that God will bring her out of her sadness and worries. Also, the dream of drinking muddy water is a sign of many problems and difficulties in her life. It also means that to see in a dream a divorced woman drinking clean water from a cup, foretells her great and mighty strength. Interpretation of the dream of drinking water after thirst. Interpretation Seeing drinking water after being thirsty in a dream is a sign of improving conditions and getting rid of evil. Also, seeing thirst and drinking water in a dream indicates the end of the problems and difficulties that the dreamer is suffering from. Interpretation of a dream about drinking water and I was not satisfiedThe interpretation of seeing drinking water in a dream and not drinking water In a dream, it indicates need and lack of resourcefulness. Also, dreaming of a lack of drinking water means a lack of money and a great need for it. Interpretation of a dream about drinking dirty water: Seeing yourself drinking dirty water in a dream is one of the unwanted dreams and it shows...

title: The meaning of the name Enas in a dream

preview.html: Enas is an Arabic feminine name, from Surah Al-Ans, meaning: harmony, tenderness, kindness, friendliness, security, and conscience. They pronounce it with the following formulas: people, mind, and mind. One name has many interpretations in a dream, all of which are praiseworthy, because they mean harmony, friendliness, and sympathy. It is one of the names that portends a bachelor and a bachelor who will get married. The name is recommended when you hear it in dreams, when you ask about it, or see it written, or when you see a character in a dream named Enas. Little girl, boy, girl or woman. The name Enas is Mahmoud for all people. The meaning of the name Enas in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of kindness and an indication of reassurance after loneliness or alienation. If an unmarried woman hears this name in her dream, it promises to meet a loved one, and also if she sees it written. The good thing is that a single woman sees in her dream a friend of hers named Enas. It is also good to see a young girl or a beautiful girl named One. Because the name in this picture or scene turns into explicit news that matches the fortuneteller’s intention and secrets. Some consider it one of the names that promise marriage because marriage is sociability. Read also: Good omens in a dream. It is also good for one to see in a dream a single woman with a beautiful face and dress. It is good to see her sitting like this, or hug her, or take from her what the fortuneteller likes and desires. I don't hate seeing that name. Except for a message or sign of confirmation from the subconscious. The meaning of Enas in a dream for a married woman: Every anxious, sad, or sad married woman sees the name Enas in her dream, except that this name is a manifestation of what the dreamer can see forever when he is awake. Especially when Ines is a friend from the past, an old neighbor, or a character who has relatively faded from memory. The good thing is also that Ines appears with a glowing face, wide eyes, medium height, and a graceful figure. If she is overweight or obese, this indicates in a dream a year filled with happiness, kindness, and grace. It is also desirable to see her married in a beautiful dress. It is good to talk to her and talk to her in D. If the dreamer is afraid, this is her security, and if he longs to meet a loved one, she will meet him soon. If you want to have children, the name has a meaning that explicitly states this. Whoever asks for the name in her sleep will have a share or wealth in her vigil. The meaning of the name Enas in a pregnant woman’s dream: The first name in a dream means that the pregnant woman is familiar, harmony, safety, and security. It does not indicate in any way the gender of the newborn. Unless a pregnant woman sees in her dream a beautiful girl playing like her or treating her, and she is the daughter of her friend or neighbor. If a pregnant woman sees any of these, she - God willing - will give birth to a female. The name is also classified in the good news for the word derived from Anas. Read also: The sister’s daughter in a dream is single and married, as well as the man. The meaning of the name Inas in the final dream. When she hears the name of one in a dream, a divorced woman can look forward to receiving love.

title: I dream of the Lord's Prayer (Christian prayer) in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of the Lord’s Prayer by Ibn SirinInterpretation of the dream of the Lord’s PrayerIn the dream, there is evidence that the dreamer has many enemies around him in his life who want to conspire against him. If a person sees in a dream that he is praying the Christian prayer and others repeat it, this indicates the presence of a friend who is endangering the dreamer’s life. The dream of entering A Christian house and performing the Lord’s Prayer in it is evidence that you are following the heresies and sins committed by the dreamer. Christian Prayer Dream of Nabulsi Simon dreams of seeing a dead Christian and the priest prays the Christian prayer over him, which indicates that the fortuneteller died adhering to a religion other than his own. Seeing a Muslim in a Christian prayer is permissible, and this indicates that he is committing sins. And immorality. Seeing a gift from a Christian during the Lord’s Prayer, this indicates that all crises and problems have been overcome. See the Christian prayer for single people. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is praying the Christian prayer after marrying a Christian, this indicates a lot of wealth and goodness that she will gain. If she sees A Christian girl visits her home and prays the Christian prayer, this indicates that she is characterized by a kind and pure heart and good behavior towards others. A dream about a Christian prayer for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream praying a Christian prayer and marrying a Christian again, and this portends goodness that will come to her husband and abundant provision. A dream indicates A Muslim woman turning into a Christian in a dream indicates some of the problems she faces. If a woman dreams that she is entering a Christian home, this indicates the high position she is in. Interpretation of a dream about the Lord’s Prayer for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees in a dream performing the Lord’s Prayer, this indicates that he greets a Christian woman, and indicates On kindness and enjoying health and well-being. If he dreams of marrying a Christian woman, he will give birth to a child who will be the apple of his eye. Dreaming of a pregnant woman eating with a Christian man in a dream, this indicates marital happiness. Dreaming of the Lord’s Prayer for a man. A man’s dream is that he enters a house full of Christians and they pray for the lady, this indicates On his marriage to a good girl with good morals. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to your marital status in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

Dreaming of a pregnant woman eating with a Christian man in a dream, this indicates marital happiness. Dreaming of the Lord’s Prayer for a man. A man’s dream is that he enters a house full of Christians and they pray for the lady, this indicates On his marriage to a good girl with good morals. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to your marital status in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a hijab for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a veil in a dream for a single woman. A dream about a veil in a single girl’s dream is good news for happy events. They indicate a positive change for the better. A return to the job you are looking for. It also indicates success and excellence in studies. Seeing buying a white veil in a bride’s dream is a sign that a marriage date Marriage and wedding. Dreaming of a veil for an unmarried woman thinking about marriage indicates engagement. Whoever sees that a man bought her a veil indicates that he is thinking about getting engaged to her. The meaning of seeing a veil in a dream for Nablus. Seeing a silk veil in a dream indicates protection and food. The veil in a man’s dream is evidence of sustenance and luck. Happy. It indicates purity, chastity, and concealment for women. Whoever sees a black veil indicates purity and peace. The meaning of seeing a girl without a veil in a dream. If a man dreams that he sees in a dream a girl he knows without a veil, but in reality she is covered, this is a sign of his rising. Good behavior in secret and do not announce it. Perhaps the vision indicates the marriage of this girl in the near future. Seeing a woman removing her hijab in front of a stranger. Whoever dreams of seeing a girl removing her hijab in front of a strange man in a dream, this is a sign of her rising. She is forbidden and must stop. This may indicate that she will marry this man in the very near future. It also indicates a change in life for the better. Seeing the hijab being taken off or put on again. If someone sees a girl taking off her hijab and then decides to put it back on, this is a sign that she has made a decision about her relationship with someone and must back off. But if the dreamer is married, the vision indicates that she is exposed to crises with her husband, but she It will end soon. The black and white veil in a dream. Seeing the black veil in a dream indicates the application of justice and equality. As for the white veil, it shows purity of the heart and purity of purity to the dreamer. title: Seeing a dead person thirsty in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a dead person thirsty in a dream. The deceased or dead person may come to the dreamer and ask him for some things, such as food, drink, or a specific thing from worldly matters. He who sees the dead says, “I am thirsty” to the divorced and the widow. Seeing the dead person thirsty may indicate the need for the dead person to pray like the father or mother if they come. To the son and they asked for water while he was thirsty, which indicates the necessity of charity. Seeing a dead relative asking for water and feeling thirsty may indicate problems that hinder the dreamer’s life, but they will end. Seeing a dead person thirsty and asking his family for water is a vision that indicates the dreamer’s wrong actions or many sins, and consequently To repent and return to God or turn away from the mistake. Seeing a dead person thirsty in a married woman’s dream. Seeing a deceased person thirsty and asking for water indicates a lot of goodness for the dreamer and that he has overcome the difficult stages. If he sees that he is giving the dead person cold water to drink, this indicates relief from distress and the disappearance of what he is suffering from. If she sees that her dead father or deceased mother is asking for water and is thirsty, this indicates the dead woman’s need for charity and supplication. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking me for cold water. Seeing dead people asking for cold water indicates a semi-weak situation for the dreamer or dreamer. Seeing a dead person asking for water and drinking in a pregnant woman’s dream. The dead person asking for water indicates fatigue and suffering for the pregnant woman. Seeing the deceased asking for cold water indicates her suffering and exhaustion from pregnancy, but this period will pass quietly. Interpretation of a dream about the living giving the dead person a bottle of water to a young man. Seeing the deceased handing over a bottle of water means that the young man will get the prestigious job that He was looking for her. A bottle of water also indicates that his marriage is approaching. Also, seeing a dead person giving a bottle of water means getting rid of worry and sadness and getting rid of the problems he suffered from. Interpretation of a dream about giving a cup of water to the dead for single women: Seeing a girl giving water to a dead person indicates the girl’s suffering and intense need To help. If we dream that we give a deceased person a glass of water, this means a lot of goodness for the dreamer, and that she has passed the difficult stages of her life. Seeing a dead person who was thirsty and asking the dreamer for water, and she gave him, means the nearness of comfort and the death of worry and anxiety. Interpretation of a dream about the dead asking for water from Reviving a dream: A man seeing in a dream that his father is asking him for water while he is thirsty means that the dreamer will suffer financial losses in business or a problem in the field of work. Also, seeing a father or uncle asking for ice water also indicates that the dreamer has forgotten that deceased person and has abandoned supplication when he needs it. To pray, read the Qur’an, and pay money is charity. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for cold water. If one sees that he asked for water and received water, this indicates that desires will be fulfilled. Seeing a dead person asking for cold or iced water indicates the dead person’s need for zakat and supplication. Seeing a dead person thirsty and asking for water indicates The dreamer's life may falter, but soon there will be relief, and this suffering will end in the event of receiving water or giving water to the dead. Interpretation of a dream about someone asking me for water. Seeing someone asking for water from the dreamer is a good dream, which indicates

title: Learn about the interpretation of a hole in the ground in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a hole in the ground: Seeing a hole is a natural occurrence that occurs in reality as a result of defective layers of the earth, and when the dreamer sees a hole in a dream, he searches for the correct interpretation and indications for this vision. His social status, and in this article we examine together the most important things that scholars have said about this dream. Interpretation of a dream about a hole in the ground. Scientists believe that a dream about a hole in the ground and the dreamer falling into it indicates that something bad will happen to him and he must be careful in every step he takes in his life. But when A man dreams that he is digging a hole in the ground for the benefit of people, and it is a special place for drinking, then goodness will come to him soon. And when the dreamer sees a hole in the ground with a pool of water, this indicates that it is one of the bad visions because it is stagnant and not renewable, so he can be affected by something unpleasant, and by God I know. And if the dreamer sees that he is digging a hole in the middle of the sea, and there is someone helping him in doing so, this means that he will meet people to overthrow an unjust ruler. The scholar Ibn Sirin says that the dreamer who makes a hole in the wall means that he will obtain profits and money in the shortest period of time. And if the fortuneteller is torn and sees that he is digging a place with a lot of stones, this means that God will give him a speedy recovery. To get the correct interpretation, conduct a search on Google. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about a hole in the ground by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a hole in a dream It has two different meanings, either good or secret for its owner, as follows: Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, says that seeing the dreamer standing on the edge of the pit and not falling into it means that some disagreements will happen to him, but they will not last long. And in the event that the sick dreamer sees a small hole in his sleep This means a speedy recovery for him. But if the debtor sees the hole in a dream and comes out of it, this will give him a lot of sustenance and he will obtain lawful money. I hope that the dreamer sees the hole in a dream, which symbolizes the approaching date of his travels, and he will obtain many benefits and goodness from it. But If the dreamer sees himself falling into the hole without harm, this means that he will be blessed with many rewards and benefits. Interpretation of a dream about a hole in the ground for a single womanInterpretation of a dream about a hole in the ground for an unmarried woman indicates that she will be deceived when she marries someone who is not good and has undesirable qualities If the girl who is studying sees a hole in the ground in her dream, this means that she will fail at this stage and will have to make a lot of efforts. But if the dreamer sees a hole in the ground and does not approach it, this is a sign of the need to stay away from the bad friends he knows so as not to fall into it. In the circle of evil. When a girl sees a hole in a dream, this means that there are some people near her who want to harm her and conspire against her. Scientists say that a girl seeing her hole in her dream generally means that she is performing some bad behavior and it may cause her problems. Also, if the girl sees the hole In a dream, this means that she will be affected by extreme sadness and the multiplication of worries for her. Interpretation of a dream about the presence of w

title: Interpretation of seeing a towel in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a towel in a dream or a dream through the website Roy2a.com, also called a towel or bathrobe. It is a well-made piece of cotton cloth that absorbs water and moisture and is used to dry the body after washing. There are different colors and designs, and seeing a towel in a dream has many meanings in the life of the dreamer. In this article, we will explain the most important interpretations of the great commentators, such as Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq, and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a towel in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a towel in a dream. How it happened during the dream, as well as what one does with it and its shape, are all things related to different interpretations. Seeing in a dream buying a towel is one of the good visions that indicate goodness, benefits, and financial and living stability for the viewer. Looking at a white towel, Pink, blue and green are among the best colors that focus on goodness and happiness in a dream. Seeing a towel inside that contains embroidery or other fabrics is an unpleasant vision that warns the dreamer of some trouble. A black towel in a dream is a sign of anxiety and sadness in the dreamer’s life. An old, worn-out towel in a dream is an indication of pain and troubles. Which the fortuneteller suffers from. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing circumcision in a dream Interpretation of seeing a towel in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing in a dream a towel is a good vision that foretells goodness and blessings for the monarch in certain places. Seeing regular towels, one type of fabric is better than embroidered, and light colors are better. Of darkness. Seeing another person’s towel in a dream indicates an exchange of interests between him and the owner of the towel. Rolling a towel over the body in a dream is a sign of success and kindness, and the single person is approaching his wedding. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a sword in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a towel in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a single girl with a towel in The dream: She uses it after bathing to dry her body as evidence that her life has changed for the better and the happiness that will come her way. Seeing a single woman using a white towel in a dream is a sign of the approaching date of her wedding, whether she wraps it around her waist or in her hair. Seeing a gifted towel in a dream means that an unmarried woman will receive Towel: For happiness and goodness in her future in various aspects of life. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing yourself sitting at a table in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a towel in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a roll of a towel in a dream. In the midst of a married woman, her pregnancy appears. Seeing many towels in the house indicates the presence of a married woman. The change in her home conditions for the better and the livelihood that she and her family will witness. Seeing a married woman placing a towel on her head to take full care of her family and doing a good job to meet their needs. Interpretation of seeing a towel in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a clean towel in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates an easy birth and the health of herself and her fetus. Seeing a pink towel For a pregnant woman in a dream, the gender of the fetus is female, and God knows best. If you see yourself sleeping on a towel, this indicates that you are pregnant.
